meta.description: Optimize the selection of food items to meet nutritional goals at minimum cost.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content in grams per unit of each food.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content in grams per unit of each food.

params.name: calories
params.description: Caloric content per unit of each food.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per unit of each food.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each food to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 100 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbohydrate_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 180 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calorie_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1796 calories are consumed.
